resources.string:
Add fresh device

Choose this option to configure new device. Usually it works as Wi-Fi access point. Setup will start with finding new device and connecting it to your home Wi-Fi network.

Add configured device

Choose this option to add device, which is available for your smartphone in the currently connected network or by external IP address.
Please enable Wi-Fi and try again.
Searching for fresh Smart Home devices…
You declined permission request, app can\'t use wi-fi

Now app will ask you for location permission. This is required to allow app to scan wi-fi. No location information will be gathered.\n\nIf you decline permission request, app will not be able to add fresh device.
Search for fresh devices has finished.\n\nNo fresh devices were found.
Search for fresh devices has finished.\n\nIf you see your device in the list, tap it.
Now choose your home network or input it\'s name manually. Searching for Wi-Fi networks…
Connect Smart Home device to this network
Device answers with unexpected response!\n\nAdding new device failed.
Device answers with unexpected response!\n\nConnection settings haven\'t been changed.
Device answers with bad response code!\n\nAdding new device failed.
Device answers with bad response code!\n\nConnection settings haven\'t been changed.
Connection problems occurred!\n\nAdding new device failed.
Connection to the device was lost!\n\nAdding new device failed.
Failed to connect to the device!\n\nAdding new device failed.
Failed to connect to the device!\n\nConnection settings haven\'t been changed.
The device could not connect to chosen Wi-Fi network!\n\nPlease check that network name and passphrase are correct and the device is in range.
Smart Home device has successfully connected to network %1$s.\n\nNow you should connect your smartphone to the same network if it will not do that automatically.
Searching for configured and not added earlier Smart Home devices in your current network…
Search for configured devices has finished.\n\nConfigured and not added earlier devices were not found.
Search for configured devices has finished.\n\nIf you see needed device in the list, tap it.
IP address is static or external
This device is already added, but with another IP address and/or port.\n\nWould you like to update them?
This settings are unavailable, because device is not connected.\n\nCheck \"Connection settings\".
Settings were saved on the device successfully!
Failed to save settings on the device!
Lightness change speed must be in range %1$d–%2$d.\n\nBad value: \'%3$s\'
Microseconds for min and max lightness must be in range %1$d–%2$d.\n\nBad value: \'%3$s\'
Microseconds for min lightness must always be greater than microseconds for max lightness.\n\nBad values: %1$d and %2$d.
Device with this MAC address was already in your list!\n\nNow it has been reconfigured. And it\'s connection settings have been updated.
Other device (with different MAC address) answers by specified connection settings!
Sorry, but this feature is not available for Android lower than 10!
Are you sure you want to remove device \"%1$s\" from the list?

Firmware update to version %1$d is available for device "%2$s".

What's new in this version:
%3$s

Proceed with update?

Firmware update will take about 30 seconds. You will be informed about the results.

PLEASE DO NOT CLOSE THE APP OR TURN OFF DEVICE "%1$s" DURING THE UPDATE!

Proceed with update?
The device does not support this feature!\nPlease update it\'s firmware.
New firmware was successfully uploaded on device \"%1$s\"!\n\nNow the device will reboot and reconnect to network.
Failed to download new firmware from server: hash mismatches!
Failed to download new firmware from server!
Failed to download new firmware: server responded with bad code!
Failed to upload new firmware to device: could not prepare buffer for sending!
Failed to upload new firmware to device!
New firmware was uploaded to device, but it responded with error!
New firmware was uploaded to device, but it responded with unexpected message!
